name: Idaho Rez Rising
description: An initiative to provide a platform connecting individuals with Native-owned businesses across Idaho. It aims to increase visibility for these businesses and offers collaborative relationship building, small business training, and access to financing

name: North Idaho Native Fund
address: (Specific address not readily available, but serves the Coeur d'Alene Reservation area.)
description: An emerging CDFI that provides technical support, business counseling, financial education, and financing options to the Coeur d'Alene Tribe and surrounding communities in Idaho and Washington. They offer small business counseling and resources, loan products, and financial education

name: Nimiipuu Community Development Fund
address: Lapwai, Idaho (Specific address not readily available.)
description: Provides technical support and business counseling to tribal members and non-members within the ancestral lands of the Nez Perce. They assist with business planning, lend to small businesses, and help community members build credit. They also offer personal financial tools and coaching
services: American-Indian-owned Credit analysis in Idaho consultation

name: Idaho Native American Women Business Alliance
description: A collaborative effort to educate and empower tribal women to start and grow thriving businesses. They plan workshops, offer training, and provide counseling services for small businesses
services: American-Indian-owned Credit analysis in Idaho consultation

name: Northwest Native Chamber (and Native Technical Assistance Program - Native TAP)
description: Offers no-cost technical assistance to Native individuals, businesses, and communities in Oregon, Washington, and Idaho. Their services include access to a network of professional service providers, including those offering accounting, bookkeeping, credit coaching, and tax preparation
